title: 12/07/2020 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 12/07/2020 - Best of The Herd
description:
-How is Bill Belichick doing this?

-That was the biggest win of Baker Mayfield's career

-The Giants beating the Seahawks is not a big upset

-Benching Carson Wentz does not solve all of the Eagles problems

-Where Colin was right, where Colin was wrong


Guest: Trent Dilfer, Super Bowl Champion QB


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
